Return.Description: Return: This method returns "probability of liquefaction".

model_transition.DescToDisplay: [km] distance for transition between global and coastal model, default: 20

Return.Description: Return: This method returns "permanent ground deformation for liquefaction-induced lateral spread".

t_15.DescToDisplay: [m] cumulative thickness (in upper 20 m) of all saturated soil layers susceptible to liquefaction (initiation with N1_60<15)

f_15.DescToDisplay: [%] average fines content of the soil within "t_15" above

d50_15.DescToDisplay: [mm] average mean grain size of the soil within "t_15" above

w_ff.DescToDisplay: [%] free face ratio (height of free face/distance from base of free face to site); for free-face model

slope.DescToDisplay: [deg] ground slope; for ground (infinite) slope model

slope_type.DescToDisplay: type of slope ("free face" or "ground"; default = "ground"

BainEtal2022_and_HutabaratEtal2022.NameToDisplay: Bain et al. (2022) and Hutabarat et al. (2022)

Return.Description: Return: This method returns "lateral spread induced tensile and compressive longitudinal pipe strain" for pipeline segments.

UpstreamDependency.Description: Upstream Dependency: This method requires "permanent ground deformation" from the "Engineering Demand Parameter - Lateral Spread" tab.

d_pipe.DescToDisplay: [mm] pipe outside diameter - required for "level 2 and 3" analysis

t_pipe.DescToDisplay: [mm] pipe wall thickness - required for "level 2 and 3" analysis

sigma_y.DescToDisplay: [kPa] pipe yield stress - can be inferred from the 'steel_grade' input parameter

n_param.DescToDisplay: Ramberg-Osgood parameter - can be inferred from the 'steel_grade' input parameter

r_param.DescToDisplay: Ramberg-Osgood parameter - can be inferred from the 'steel_grade' input parameter

h_pipe.DescToDisplay: [m] burial depth to pipe centerline - required for "level 3" analysis

alpha_backfill.DescToDisplay: adhesion factor (clay model only) - required for "level 3" analysis

s_u_backfill.DescToDisplay: [kPa] undrained shear strength (clay model only) - required for "level 3" analysis

gamma_backfill.DescToDisplay: [kN/m^3] total unit weight of backfill soil (sand model only) - required for "level 3" analysis

phi_backfill.DescToDisplay: [deg] friction angle of backfill soil (sand model only) - required for "level 3" analysis

delta_backfill.DescToDisplay: sand-pipe interface friction angle ratio (sand model only) - required for "level 3" analysis

soil_type.DescToDisplay: soil type for backfill ("sand" or "clay" for model to use) - required for "level 1, 2, 3" analysis

soil_density.DescToDisplay: soil density for sand backfill ("medium dense", "dense", or "very dense") - required for "level 1, 2, 3" analysis

Return.Description: Return: This method returns the "critical compressive pipe strain" at which 50% probability of compression-induced rupture expected to occur.

UpstreamDependency.Description: Upstream Dependency: This method requires "compressive pipe strain" from any of the pipe strain subtabs under"Damage Measure".

Return.Description: Return: This method returns the "critical tensile pipe strain" at which 50% probability of tension-induced rupture expected to occur.

UpstreamDependency.Description: Upstream Dependency: This method requires "tensile pipe strain" from any of the pipe strain subtabs under"Damage Measure".

N/A.DescToDisplay: This model has no additional input parameters from users

Return.Description: Return: This method returns the "critical tensile pipe strain" at which 50% probability of tension-induced leakage expected to occur.

UpstreamDependency.Description: Upstream Dependency: This method requires "tensile pipe strain" from any of the pipe strain subtabs under"Damage Measure".

N/A.DescToDisplay: This model has no additional input parameters from users
